documents.document: This is fucking hilarious https://t.co/SERDC3RBaT
I thought it'd be pretty hard to cut tax when you pay none... https://t.co/bXBtiDWPtR
The party scene where she requests 'I ran' was hilarious though.
There probably needed to be a little more humour throughout. At times it took itself too seriously.
I saw it as less about dreams and more about what it costs to compromise on those dreams but I felt the stakes were way low.
The dancing was not an issue (caveat: I don't know what good dancing looks like) but the leads not being good singers is hella annoying.
It's a fantasy so I can accept Ryan Gosling being all 'I'm gonna save jazz'. That's what a lot of white boys do, okay.
Ok I just saw La La Land so here's my tepid take: it doesn't suck.

Extreme vetting*
*but not for white people who want guns

Checked the BOM app, which said there'd be no rain in my area for four days just as raindrops started to fall outside... 🤔
It's a shame that the parts of the flat that are the best temperature for thinking—the corridor and the fridge—are ergonomically bad.
Wondering about the possibility of martial law in the US.
The worst kind of revision is the kind where the editor wants you to fact-check your own work even though you ALREADY PROVIDED REFERENCES.
Gustav and Arthur have stopped making a tissue fort and have rightfully settled down for a nap next to the ice brick.
When you see your neighbours do cool things like go swimming or eat pancakes for brunch on their balcony and you're working 😢
I'm having a terrible horrib le no god very bad typo day

@kplyley That's it? What an arsehole. I'm sorry you had to live through that, esp its effects on your relationship with mutual friends.

Just saw Huff. Darkly funny, astonishing in range, brutal in its emotional heft. One man's short life and its web of implications #sydfest
Boff to Mama Boff: "You know one of the best ways to prevent dementia is to learn new things. So you should learn about neurophysiology."
Had lunch with my mum today: "Your aunty Karen's not doing Chinese New Year so this is it, just you and me. Happy new year." But no ang pow!
I am a ROOSTER! Hear me roar! I mean crow. Crow, not roar. Fuck... I'm not a TIGER. #gongxifacai

Interviewee has emailed to say he's running late but can talk to me soon! Lucky my 'normal' bedtime is 2-3am.
I should add that he was v enthusiastic about doing the interview and the article is due tomorrow.
Ok Twitter, what do I do? US interviewee is not answering Skype or phone and neither is his assistant. Do I give up and go to sleep?
When you've lined up an interview with someone in the USA (15 mins ago!) and they haven't arrived at work yet 😣
Did Skype get less comprehensible in the year since I've used it? How do I... find and add someone?
@sarahjansencom Ping me the airbnb url and I'll save it for my next trip down.

Listening to a whole bunch of new stuff I bought but haven't immersed myself in. Prateek Kuhad's album 'In Tokens & Charms' is tops. Talent.
@PatrickLenton If art challenges and is also entertaining, we seem to downgrade it from being art.
@PatrickLenton If art fails to challenge we shrug but it's still art.

Maybe I should do my 2016 tax return. Earnt far more last financial year than the previous two. BAH!
I realise this is the most privileged thing ever, complaining about being rejected for a credit card I didn't need, but I'm hella annoyed.
The irony is I only applied because I plan to do a shitload of travel this year and I wanted the card to boost my frequent flyer points.
I have an A+ credit rating and now it is wrecked by this rejection so it's going to make it hard for me to refinance my mortgage.
